mapper.select: select o.num, o.order_number, o.order_cost, o.member_number, o.book_id, o.order_status, m.member_id, b.book_title, b.book_price, o.order_phone, o.order_name, o.order_address, m.member_name from ezenbooks b, ezenmembers m, ezenorders o where o.member_number = m.member_number and o.book_id=b.book_id order by o.num
mapper.insert: insert into ezenorders (num, order_number, order_cost, member_number, book_id, order_status, order_phone, order_name, order_address) values(ezenorders_num_seq.nextval, #{order_number}, #{order_cost}, #{member_number}, #{book_id}, 1, #{order_phone}, #{order_name}, #{order_address})
